ROM.Changelog: 1.ConsumerIR Enabled 2.kernel update to 3.4.113 3.CPU speed unlocked, from 100 mhz to 2000 MHz. 4.brightness improved. 5.ODEX enabled to speed up system. 6.Samsung Gralloc enabled 7.Scaler Enabled. 8.Advanced Low power audio support. 9.charger enhanced. 10.Battery life hugely improved. 11.more mokee stuff added. 12.Doze performance improved. 13.Sdcardfs enabled.
